title: Strange nice font
content:
Hi,

I'm enjoying a lot this font, but cannot identify it! Maybe some sort of gothic?

[Opéra Comique](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826133629/http:/www.opera-comique.com/2009/programme.html)

Look at the big headings, and how cool the "R" is, for example in the word "ZOROASTRE"

any idea, anybody?

thanx a lot :)
author: baz the baz

comments.content:
It could be all kinds of things at that size and all caps. I think it’s [TheSans Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826133629/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/lucasfonts/thesans_basic/).

In fact everything but that ‘DIDO AND AENEAS’ headline is TheSans.
Looks like Neutraface from House Industries.

yeah, Neutraface, exactly, thanx a lot :)

and headlines on the left look like TheSans

long life to this forum!
